# susy3dapp

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/susy3dapp)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=susy3dapp)
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/CorradoLanera/susy3dapp/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/CorradoLanera/susy3dapp?branch=master)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `{susy3dapp}` is to provide a Demo for the SusySafe 3d
Shiny App.

## Installation

You can install the released version of susy3dapp from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("zeta-r/susy3dapp")
```
